html:
10.27.18  9:38 pm   can you help me write a song

     sure

10.27.18  9:04 pm   On a scale of 1-10, how many planets do you have an intimate relationship with?

     1

10.27.18  7:16 pm   is 1am late or early?

     every time is late and early

10.27.18  7:15 pm   Is the poem about rain in When I Get Older supposed to be a metaphor for sadness?

     no

10.27.18  6:49 pm   What color is the void?

     very dark black but in the newer versions you can set it to any color

10.27.18  6:32 pm   Do you like lava lamps?

     i wish they had more lava in them

10.27.18  6:27 pm   Why are harmonicas called that

     because of the sound they make

10.27.18  6:14 pm   is there a way to get younger?

     probably

10.27.18  6:12 pm   what's your favorite vegetable

     karat

10.27.18  4:23 pm   If boredom is the problem, what is the solution?

     problems

10.27.18  3:50 pm   what make us stronger?~e

     almost everything

10.27.18  3:41 pm   What was the idea behind your first video?

     i wonder if i can make a video

10.27.18  12:30 pm   What are your thoughts on communism?

     seems legit

10.27.18  11:02 am   If you did vinyl singles, would you have the singles be double a-sides or just use older songs as b-sides?

     in a vinyl world i would possibly be putting more like 5 songs on them

10.27.18  8:08 am   Do you think music/art has a moral obligation to carry a positive message?

     hopefully something a little more potent than a message

10.27.18  7:06 am   i keep creating but how do i know when im done creating. when does the creating process stop and I can give people the thing I created

     it is never done. you will have to stop before it's done. so if it's not done, then you know it's a perfect time to stop

10.27.18  3:02 am   how do you do it

     i'm not sure but i would like to know soon

10.27.18  3:01 am   What do I do if my pants aren't sexy?

     you can get store credit

10.27.18  1:02 am   Do you try to add comedic elements to your song?

     no but sometimes i try to take them out

10.27.18  12:49 am   Is there a story going through your songs, or do you just write what comes to your head?

     it is usually a different story for each song

10.27.18  12:38 am   Are you a shapeshifting iguana?

     sure

10.27.18  12:24 am   What's your favorite board game?

     hop scotch

10.26.18  11:36 pm   do the overtone and undertone series explain all harmony?

     no

10.26.18  11:03 pm   have you tried listning to 2 songs at once to enhance the effect the song has on your brain?

     yes

10.26.18  10:49 pm   how do you make it rain

     you can't make it rain, you can only make it stop

10.26.18  10:11 pm   was "special thanks to the whole entire world" at the end of When I'm Older a secret homage to how hotewig influenced you?

     no

10.26.18  10:06 pm   what can i do for things that make too much sense.

     try to get them to make even more sense

10.26.18  9:16 pm   How do you feel about the human race?

     pretty good

10.26.18  7:42 pm   Does the word "podcast" as included in your next song relate at all to your consideration of coming on the H3 podcast?

     no

10.26.18  6:51 pm   can i write you a song

     sure

10.26.18  6:11 pm   Have you tryed one time think what someone os thinking about your songs, because your songs are so original and liberals that many people think diferent against others, curious right?

     yes

10.26.18  5:54 pm   Help. I can't write songs that actually mean what I want them to mean. I can pick a broad topic and write surrounding that but when I have certain feelings or experiences I want to incorporate it just doesn't work for me. So I either end up picking a specific topic and writing a song that feels dgktkfisys or I end up picking a broad topic or no topic at all and writing a song that sounds good but has no meaning at all. And this makes me sad because I want my songs to mean something when I want them to mean something. Has something similar ever happened to you? How do I write what I really want?

     keep attempting, but when the real magic will happen is in between attempts, it will knock you in the head when you least expect it, sometimes in the middle of the night

10.26.18  4:53 pm   does is upset you that zebras are just striped horses?

     does it upset you that they are not

10.26.18  4:44 pm   Hey bill, why does everyone hates me?

     that's not hate, it's surely some kind of jealousy

10.26.18  1:53 pm   What are you thinking of right now?

     how they got all the fortune into that wheel

10.26.18  12:04 pm   What are your thoughts on Waffle Irons

     wouldn't that ruin the waffle

10.26.18  10:58 am   I have an idea and it won't let me go. What should I do?

     whatever it says

10.26.18  10:28 am   i've been trying to write my own songs about how i feel but the lyrics always end up sounding like lyrics from songs i already listen to a lot, was this ever a problem for you? how do i make something that sounds original?

     make a list of 10 lyrics that would never never be in a song. that should get you started. if you can't think of any, then open the bathroom cabinet and start reading the product labels

10.26.18  10:01 am   name my dog

     namey

10.26.18  9:36 am   how do you brainstorm lyrics?

     just start writing things down and keep thinking of things and then eventually the good ones will start hitting you in the face. if it's not hitting you in the face then it's not good, that's what i say

10.26.18  8:26 am   This is interesting for me to know.

Does having perfect pitch sometimes mess with your daily life.
Like if you heard a noise like a generator or a car horn, you can't help your brain from figuring out the note of the sound.
And you can't stand it when a song is sung in a different key than the original. I've heard some people say that.

     they are just showing off. those things would never be bothersome for any reason related to absolute pitch. in fact usually when i hear someone complain about an issue like that, they are faking anyway and they are wrong about the notes they are complaining about

10.26.18  8:06 am   how do you find the courage to be so genuine?

     that's what unlocks most of the secrets

10.26.18  7:38 am   Let's say you'll finally achieve what you want to achieve. Like you "get there" or whatever. What would that mean?

     time to achieve more

      Where are we going?

     around the world

10.26.18  4:01 am   How do I decide on a voicing of a specific chord if they all sound the same to me?

     then i guess it doesn't matter. as long as you think it sounds ok

      "Just use whatever sounds better to you" doesn't work for me because they all sound pretty much equal to me, I wouldn't know which one to prefer.

     if they both sound good to you then you can use either. if neither sounds good then don't use any

      Is my ear just not developed enough? What makes a "good" voicing?

     if it increases the attachment the listener feels with the song

      I hear a lot of "pay attention to the voicing" but I don't know what that actually means or what I have to do. Should I like pay attention that there aren't any minor seconds in the voicing or something?

     as long as it doesn't sound to you like it's ruining everything then you should be fine

10.26.18  2:52 am   can you summarize your day to day basis

     i keep renovating swimming pools that are already renovated, just in case

10.26.18  1:47 am   is there anything you cant do?

     photosynthesis?

10.26.18  1:33 am   I made a mistake....what do I do?

     start working toward that second mistake

10.26.18  12:34 am   What's the most important takeaway you've received from your college education?

     i don't recall getting one

10.25.18  11:38 pm   What is your favorite thing, least favorite thing, or just a thing about going on business trips?

     biscuits, to go

10.25.18  10:57 pm   What is the best form of food?

     pill
